ValidationRule.description: IF ((Penalty_Interest_Paid__c - Penalty_Interest_Recovered__c) > 0.00 ) THEN Closure Code MUST start with "Paid" or Reduced"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Penalty_Interest_Paid__c - Penalty_Interest_Recovered__c >0, NOT( OR( BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c) ,"Paid"), BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c) ,"Reduced"), ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c,""))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Code must be Paid or Reduced when Amount Paid > 0
